已过时的 API

目录
  • 已过时的类
  • 已过时的方法
已过时的类
org.commontemplate.standard.loader.ClasspathResourceLoader
          替换为ClasspathSourceLoader 
org.commontemplate.standard.loader.DataSourceResourceLoader
          替换为DataSourceLoader 
org.commontemplate.standard.loader.FileResourceLoader
          替换为FileSourceLoader 
org.commontemplate.standard.loader.JarResourceLoader
          替换为JarSourceLoader 
org.commontemplate.standard.loader.RemoteResourceLoader
          替换为RemoteSourceLoader 
org.commontemplate.standard.loader.StringResourceLoader
          替换为StringSourceLoader 
org.commontemplate.standard.loader.WebappResourceLoader
          替换为WebappSourceLoader 
org.commontemplate.standard.loader.ZipResourceLoader
          替换为ZipSourceLoader 
 

已过时的方法
org.commontemplate.util.StringUtils.capitalise(String)
          Use the standardly named StringUtils.capitalize(String). Method will be removed in Commons Lang 3.0. 
org.commontemplate.util.StringUtils.reverseDelimitedString(String, String)
          Use StringUtils.reverseDelimited(String, char) instead. This method is broken as the join doesn't know which char to use. Method will be removed in Commons Lang 3.0. 
org.commontemplate.standard.filter.SourceFilterChain.setResourceFilters(List)
          兼容函数，建议使用setSourceFilters 
org.commontemplate.util.StringUtils.uncapitalise(String)
          Use the standardly named StringUtils.uncapitalize(String). Method will be removed in Commons Lang 3.0.
